content: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at West Virginia University. My main research interest is applied economics, with a focus on on health, energy, public/regional economics, and applied machine learning.
summary: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at West Virginia University. My main research interest is applied economics, with a focus on on health, energy, public/regional economics, and applied machine learning.
